name: Metagalactic Llamas Battle at the Edge of Time
name_original: Metagalactic Llamas Battle at the Edge of Time
description:
Metagalactic Llamas Battle at the Edge of Time is an action game developed by Jeff Minter. It was originally released in 1983.
You can play Metagalactic Llamas Battle at the Edge of Time on Commodore / Amiga.
